A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson clearly had a number of set pieces that he wanted in the movie. He then proceeded to cobble together a story around that. There is significant inattention to plot details and a disrespect of the Star Wars lore. The movie was visually stunning and my overall experience was positive. I hope JJ Abrams can address some of the unanswered questions in Episode IX. I also hope that the Lucasfilm story group assist in the writing of Rian Johnson's proposed new trilogy.
